column1: S101B.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S101B.DECK.  101. SURVEY NUMBER
S101B.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S101B.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RAN?  1. CAPTAIN 2. 1ST LIEUTENANT 3. 2ND LIEUTENANT 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT RAN?  0. NO ANSWER 1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS
S101B.Q3. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED AND HAVE NO CHILDREN 3. MARRIED AND DO HAVE CHILDREN 4. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED

S101B.Q4. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEA? E. FOR NATIONAL GUARD TROOPS THIS MEANS ACTIVE SERVICE.  1. SIX MONTHS OR LESS 2. MORE THAN 6 MONTHS BUT NOT OVER 1 YEAR 3. MORE THAN 1 YEAR BUT NOT OVER 1 1/2 YEARS 4. MORE THAN 1 1/2 YEARS

S101B.Q5. WHAT MONTH AND YEAR DID YOU JOIN THIS DIVISIO? E. MONTH:  01. JANUARY 02. FEBRUARY 03. MARCH 04. APRIL 05. MAY 06. JUNE 07. JULY 08. AUGUST 09. SEPTEMBER 10. OCTOBER 11. NOVEMBER 12. DECEMBER E. YEAR:
S101B.Q5. WHAT MONTH AND YEAR DID YOU JOIN THIS DIVISIO? E. MONTH:  26 1. 1940 OR EARLIER 36 2. 1941 185 3. 1942 20 4. 1943 0 5. 1944 X. QUESTION 6A NOT CODED.

S101B.Q6B. ABOUT HOW MANY DAYS ALTOGETHER, HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT NOT COUNTING THE DAYS YOU'VE SPENT BACK OF THE LINE OR AWAY FROM THE FRON?  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER DAYS) 003. 3 DAYS . . . 252. 252 DAYS 000. NONE 999.NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6C AND 6D NOT CODED.

S101B.Q7. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER

S101B.Q8. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. ALL OTHERS 00. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q9A. ARE YOU:  1. A LINE OFFICER 2. A STAFF OFFICER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q9B. IF YOU HAD A CHANCE TO CHOOSE WOULD YOU RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER OR A STAFF OFFICE?  1. RATHER BE A STAFF OFFICER 2. RATHER BE A LINE OFFICER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q9C. WHO HAVE THE BETTER CHANCE FOR PROMOTIO?  1. LINE OFFICERS 2. STAFF OFFICERS 3. ABOUT THE SAME 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q9D. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE COMPARATIVE PROMOTION OPPORTUNITIES OF LINE OFFICERS AND STAFF OFFICER?  1. I THINK THE PRESENT PRACTICE IS O.K. 2. I THINK THE PRESENT PRACTICE IS SOMEWHAT UNFAIR 3. I THINK THE PRESENT PRACTICE IS VERY UNFAIR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 10 NOT CODED.
S101B.Q11. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME YOU WERE IN COMBAT WERE YOU A MEMBER OF THE COMPANY YOU ARE NOW I?  1. ALL OR MOST OF THE TIME 2. SOME OF THE TIME 3. LITTLE OR NONE OF THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q12. ABOUT HOW MANY BATTLE CASUALTIES (KILLED AND WOUNDED) HAS YOUR PRESENT COMPANY HAD SINCE YOU FIRST WENT INTO COMBAT WITH I?  1. MORE THAN HALF OF THE MEN HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 2. BETWEEN A QUARTER AND A HALF HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 3. LESS THAN A QUARTER HAVE BEEN CASUALTIES 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q13. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS

S101B.Q14. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE RIFLEMAN'S JOB IN MODERN BATTL?  1. MORE IMPORTANT THAN MOST ANY OTHER SOLDIER'S JOB 2. IMPORTANT, BUT NO MORE SO THAN MANY OTHERS 3. NOT VERY IMPORTANT COMPARED WITH WHAT OTHER SOLDIERS CAN DO 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q15. WHAT SORT OF TEAMWORK DID THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY SHOW IN ACTUAL BATTL?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT VERY GOOD 4. NOT GOOD AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q16. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q17. WHEN YOU WERE FIGHTING IN A PARTICULAR BATTLE, DID YOU EVER HAVE THE FEELING THAT IT WASN'T WORTH THE COS?  1. YES, ALMOST ALWAYS 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q18. WHILE YOU WERE AT THE BATTLE FRONT, DID YOUR LEADERS EXPLAIN THE WHOLE BATTLE SO YOU COULD SEE JUST HOW YOUR COMPANY'S PART FITTED INTO THE CAMPAIGN AS A WHOL?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A LITTLE MORE 3. THEY COULD HAVE GIVEN US A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q19. WHILE YOU WERE IN COMBAT, DID YOU FEEL THAT THE TROOPS IN THE REAR, IN GENERAL, WERE DOING AS MUCH AS THEY COULD UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES, FOR THE MEN WHO WERE DOING THE FIGHTIN?  1. AS MUCH AS THEY COULD 2. COULD HAVE DONE SOMEWHAT MORE 3. COULD HAVE DONE A GREAT DEAL MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q20. DID YOU RECEIVE ANY OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATION?  1. PURPLE HEART 2. SILVER STAR 3. DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 4. PURPLE HEART AND SILVER STAR 5. PURPLE HEART AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 6. SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 7. PURPLE HEART, SILVER STAR AND DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS 8. NONE OF THE THREE (PURPLE HEART, SILVER STAR, DISTINGUISHED SERVICE CROSS) 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q21A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE WAY IN WHICH THE SILVER STAR IS AWARDED TO ENLISTED ME?  1. ALL MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM REALLY DESERVED THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 3. MANY MEN I KNOW WHO GOT THEM DID NOT DESERVE THEM 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q21B. DO YOU KNOW ANY ENLISTED MEN WHO DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THE?  1. MANY MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THEM 2. A FEW MEN I KNOW DESERVED SILVER STARS BUT DID NOT GET THEM 3. NOBODY I KNOW DESERVED A SILVER STAR BUT DID NOT GET IT 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q22. IN GENERAL WOULD YOU SAY THAT BATTLE FIGHTING BECAME MORE FRIGHTENING OR LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE YOU SAW OF I?  1. IT WAS MORE FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 2. IT WAS LESS FRIGHTENING THE MORE I SAW OF IT 3. IT WAS NEVER FRIGHTENING 4. IT STAYED FRIGHTENING ALL THE TIME 0. NO ANSWER X. CODES 01-04 PRECODED ON QUESTIONNAIRE, OTHER RESPONSES VOLUNTEERED.

S101B.Q23. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU WOULD FEEL ABOUT GOING BACK INTO ACTUAL BATTL?  01. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 02. I AM READY TO GO ANYTIME 03. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BUT IF I GO I THINK I WILL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 05. HAVE DONE MY SHARE, LET OTHERS FIGHT 06. NEED A REST OR FURLOUGH FIRST 07. COULDN'T STAND IT, AFRAID, NERVES SHOT 08. PHYSICAL CONDITION 09. QUALIFIED ACCEPTANCE 10. REFUSAL (MISCELLANEOUS) 11. ALL OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q24. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET
S101B.Q25. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q26A. DO YOU THINK THAT THE EQUIPMENT OF THE AMERICAN ARMY IS BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE EQUIPMENT OF THE JAPANESE ARM?  1. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 2. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS BETTER 3. OUR EQUIPMENT IS ABOUT THE SAME AS THAT OF THE JAPANESE ARMY 4. MOST OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 5. ALL OF OUR EQUIPMENT IS WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW
S101B.Q26B. IF YOU THINK SOME JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS WHAT ARE THE?  1. NO JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 2. SOME JAPANESE WEAPONS ARE BETTER THAN OURS 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q27. THINK OF ALL THE MEN IN YOUR PLATOON (OR EQUIVALENT UNIT) JUST BEFORE YOU WENT INTO ACTION FOR THE FIRST TIME. NOW THINK OF THE ONE MAN WHO HAD SERVED TIME THE MOST IN THE GUARDHOUSE. HOW DID HE DO IN ACTUAL BATTLE AS COMPARED WITH OTHER MEN IN THE PLATOO?  1. HE DID MUCH BETTER THAN AVERAGE 2. HE DID BETTER THAN AVERAGE 3. SAME AS AVERAGE 4. HE DID WORSE THAN AVERAGE 5. HE DID MUCH WORSE THAN AVERAGE 6. ANY OTHER ANSWER 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q28. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT SERVING UNDER YOU IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q29. IF SOME OF THE NON-COMS YOU HAVE ARE NOT THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT IN COMBAT, WHY HAVEN'T YOU REPLACED THE?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE THE KIND I WOULD WANT IN COMBAT 2. NO BETTER MEN ARE AVAILABLE 3. I DON'T HAVE AUTHORITY TO CHANGE THEM MYSELF 4. I DON'T WANT TO BREAK PRESENT NON-COMS AND CAN'T TRANSFER THEM OUT 5. SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q30A. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY (OR BATTERY) ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT TO SERVE WITH IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q30B. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY ARE THE KIND YOU WOULD WANT SERVING UNDER YOU IN COMBA?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q30C. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY (OR BATTERY) ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q30D. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS IN YOUR COMPANY (OR BATTERY) TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q32. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q33. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR S?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q34. AFTER THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL BE A BETTER PLACE OR A WORSE PLACE TO LIVE IN THAN IT WAS BEFORE THE WA?  1. WORSE AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. BETTER AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q35A. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE GERMAN?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q35B. WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR IDEA OF HOW HARD IT IS GOING TO BE TO BEAT THE JAPANES?  1. IT WILL NOT BE VERY HARD 2. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, BUT OUR LOSSES WON'T BE HEAVY 3. IT WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, WITH HEAVY LOSSES OF MEN AND EQUIPMENT 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q37A. BEFORE YOU WENT INTO COMBAT FOR THE FIRST TIME, HOW MUCH CONFIDENCE DID YOU HAVE IN YOUR ME?  1. HAD A LOT OF CONFIDENCE IN MY MEN 2. HAD A FAIR AMOUNT OF CONFIDENCE IN MY MEN 3. HAD LITTLE CONFIDENCE IN MY MEN 4. HAD NO CONFIDENCE IN MY MEN 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q37B. DID YOU HAVE MORE OR LESS CONFIDENCE IN YOUR MEN, THE MORE TIMES YOUR OUTFIT WENT INTO COMBA?  1. HAD MORE CONFIDENCE THE MORE TIMES MY OUTFIT WENT INTO COMBAT 2. HAD LESS CONFIDENCE THE MORE TIMES MY OUTFIT WENT INTO COMBAT 3. HAD ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT OF CONFIDENCE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q38. DID SUPPLIES YOU MUCH WANTED OR NEEDED AT THE FRONT EVER FAIL TO REACH YO?  1. WE USUALLY GOT WHAT WE NEEDED 2. WE OFTEN DID NOT GET WHAT WE NEEDED 3. WE SELDOM GOT WHAT WE NEEDED 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q39. HAVE YOU LISTENED TO RADIO TOKY? IF YES, HOW DID YOU FEEL ABOUT THE RADIO PROPAGAND?  1. YES, MOSTLY LIES 2. YES, MOSTLY LIES, BUT MAYBE A LITTLE MORE TRUTH THAN WE CARE TO ADMIT 3. YES, A LOT OF TRUTH IN WHAT THEY SAID 4. YES, NO ANSWER 5. NO

S101B.Q40A. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q40B. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WA?  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMAN 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 41 NOT CODED.

S101B.Q42. IN GENERAL, DID YOU USUALLY FEEL MORE SCARED BEFORE GOING INTO COMBAT, DURING COMBAT, OR AFTER COMBA?  1. BEFORE GOING INTO COMBAT 2. DURING COMBAT 3. AFTER COMBAT 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43A. VIOLENT POUNDING OF THE HEAR?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43B. SINKING FEELING IN THE STOMAC?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43C. FEELING OF WEAKNESS OR FEELING FAIN?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43D. FEELING SICK AT THE STOMAC?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43E. COLD SWEA?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43F. VOMITIN?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43G. SHAKING OR TREMBLING ALL OVE?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43H. URINATING IN PANT?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43I. LOSING CONTROL OF BOWEL?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S101B.Q43J. FEELING OF STIFFNES?  1. OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONCE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S101B.Q44. IN YOUR OPINION, WHAT SHOULD BE DONE WITH MEN WHO CRACK UP IN ACTION, THAT IS, MEN WHO GET SHELL-SHOCKED, BLOW THEIR TOPS, GO HAYWIR?  1. MOST OF THEM SHOULD BE TREATED AS SICK MEN 2. MOST OF THEM SHOULD BE TREATED AS COWARDS AND PUNISHED 3. MOST OF THEM SHOULD BE TREATED SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 45A, 45B AND 46 NOT CODED.

S101B.Q47A. WHEN THE GOING WAS TOUGH, HOW MUCH DID IT HELP YOU TO THINK THAT YOU HAD TO FINISH THE JOB IN ORDER TO GET HOME AGAI?  1. IT HELPED A LOT 2. IT HELPED SOME 3. IT HELPED A LITTLE 4. IT DID NOT HELP AT ALL 5. I DIDN'T THINK OF IT 0. NO ANSWER
